title: Expl02ive Module
desc:
Post 832
- Can only be played with <:weapon:1107519313075785768> cards.
- When played, the <:weapon:1107519313075785768> explodes, turning the target’s cards into <:red:1106234051129507932>, <:black:1106265022453268530>, or <:gray:1107516393450127411> randomly.
- if the card is one of the 5 that dont target a player because @hyperswag506 forgot <:weapon:1107519313075785768>s are supposed to harm other players, this cant be used on that weapon.
